subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Wang Hao won the women’s 10-meter platform at the USA Diving Grand Prix in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., then teamed with her Chinese teammate Kang Li to take the synchronized event off the high board.
snippet: Wang Hao won the women’s 10-meter platform at the USA Diving Grand Prix in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., then teamed with her Chinese teammate Kang Li to take the synchronized event off the high board.
